Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Malibu in 1971...
Injured on 7/9/1974 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 7/9/1976, off Warner Cannaday (DIA)...
Injured on 8/14/1976 with a Fractured Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1978, hitting .444 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 4/29/1978 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/29/1978 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1980, hitting .385 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Toledo on 8/15/1980...
Injured on 8/30/1981 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New Jersey on 4/29/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/17/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $971,800 per year...
